mapper.select: select * from userinfo where userid=#{userid} and userpwd =#{userpwd}
mapper.insert: insert into board(seq,title,writer,content,userid) values ((select nvl(max(seq),0)+1 from board),#{title},#{writer},#{content},#{userid})
mapper.select: select * from Board order by seq
mapper.update: update Board set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where seq=#{seq}
